main event: Two sightings were reported in Madison, Wisconsin, in August 1950, featuring one elliptical object observed circling and rising vertically and then disappearing, followed by a second object hovering and accelerating vertically before it also disappeared.
interesting points: The first object was observed circling slowly before it ascended vertically., The second object was seen hovering for a period before making a rapid ascent., The sightings occurred within a timeline of 1-2 minutes., The initial sighting had 9 witnesses., It was classified as a probable aircraft in ratings.
